com.meltmedia.cadmium.servlets
Interface SecureRedirectStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSecureRedirectStrategy, SimpleSecureRedirectStrategy, XForwardedSecureRedirectStrategy
public interface SecureRedirectStrategy

A strategy for identifying the security of a request and changing the security of a request.

Author:
Christian Trimble

Method Summary
 boolean isSecure(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          Returns true if the original request was made over a secure protocol, false otherwise.
 void makeInsecure(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
          Sends the redirect required to change the request from secure to insecure.
 void makeSecure(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
          Sends the redirect required to change the request from insecure to secure.
 

Method Detail

isSecure

boolean isSecure(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Returns true if the original request was made over a secure protocol, false otherwise.

Parameters:
request - The request to test.
Returns:
true if the original request was made over a secure protocol, false otherwise.

makeSecure

void makeSecure(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                throws java.io.IOException
Sends the redirect required to change the request from insecure to secure.

Parameters:
request - the insecure request that should be secure.
response - the response to send redirect information to.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem redirecting the user.

makeInsecure

                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Sends the redirect required to change the request from secure to insecure.

Parameters:
request - the secure request that should be insecure.
response - the response to send redirect information to.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is a problem redirecting the user.
